Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 93rd overall pick, by New Jersey in 1975...
Earned first career win on 4/29/1978...
Traded from New Jersey to Bay City on 7/7/1980 (Going to NJ: CF J. Castilla. Going to BC: P G. Brito, C W. Armenta, 3B B. Austin)...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/6/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $2,250,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 6/16/1983, off Barton Clatterbuck (NJ)...
Injured on 4/20/1984 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/8/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/20/1989 to a 5-year deal worth $1,117,100 per year...
Won World Championship with Troy in 1989...
